attributes.additional_details: Hundreds of residents of Stainforth & thorne are being left stranded due to the closure of the train bridge on kirton lane in Stainforth completely cutting off access to thorne. Bus services in and out of the village have been stopped from after 7pm at night. The shuttle bus only serves as far as Newpark estate and isn't timed with the connection of the other buses. Something needs doing about this.
